channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Zuck's vision for an AI-powered workforce
item.description: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg said 2026 will be the year "AI starts to dramatically change the way that we work," as his company flattens teams and provide...

item.title: Scoop: House Democrats told by leadership not to go to Minnesota
item.description: House Democrats have been privately advised by their leadership not to travel to Minnesota in support of anti-ICE protesters there, Axios has learned....

item.title: The 3 groups lagging most in America's post-COVID rebound
item.description: In a stunning warning for the rapidly-aging U.S., poverty rose for seniors in more than 800 counties over the past five years, according to new Census...

item.title: Trump gets shy about firing his own
item.description: President Trump dismissed a bipartisan groundswell calling for Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem to be fired after Alex Pretti was killed — a ne...

item.title: Saudi and Israeli officials visit D.C. to discuss possible U.S. strikes on Iran
item.description: The Trump administration is hosting senior defense and intelligence officials from Israel and Saudi Arabia for talks on Iran this week as President Tr...

item.title: FBI executes search warrant seeking ballots from Fulton County’s 2020 election
item.description: The FBI executed a search warrant in Fulton County, Georgia, for 2020 election ballots, as President Donald Trump seeks to find already debunked voter...

item.title: Trump faces fresh MAGA blowback for efforts to ‘de-escalate’ in Minnesota
item.description: The president’s response to widespread public dismay over the shooting death of another Minnesotan has put him in a bind with his own base.

item.title: Top Democratic groups urge party to shed soft-on-crime image, hire police
item.description: The Center for American Progress wants Democrats ‘on their front foot’ talking about crime, an issue where Republicans have long held the advantage.

item.title: VA leaders have barely acknowledged Alex Pretti’s death, workers say
item.description: Employees at the Minneapolis VA hospital were initially told they could not hold a memorial for Pretti, though that decision was later reversed.

item.title: Rep. Ilhan Omar says ‘fear and intimidation doesn’t work on me’ after town hall attack
item.description: Omar said President Donald Trump’s rhetoric about her has increased the threats she faces.

item.title: Trump in Iowa tries to shift the conversation back to the economy
item.description: A brief swing through the farm state underscored administration fears about the midterms.

item.title: Americans give Trump low marks on handling of economy as midterms likely to center on affordability
item.description: Sixty-one percent of voters told a CNN poll released Friday that they disapprove of the way Trump is handling the economy.

item.title: Capitol agenda: Trump tests GOP with Fed probe
Ex-Trump voters swung hard to Democrats over costs in NJ & VA, new research shows
item.description: Voters who backed Donald Trump in 2024 and swung to Democrats in this year's Virginia and New Jersey elections did so over economic concerns, accordin...

item.title: Vance tries to thread affordability needle in Rust Belt
item.description: The vice president fine-tunes Trump’s economic message, but he's only got so much wiggle room.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
